{"id":1086641161,"question_id":3171,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"8Â months","timestamp":1698562836,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"3 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1086641161/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Minimum Equal Sum of Two Arrays After Replacing Zeros","memory":"59.1 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public long minSum(int[] nums1, int[] nums2) {\n        long c1 = 0, c2 = 0;\n        long sum1=0, sum2=0;\n        for(int i =0;i<nums1.length;i++){\n            sum1+=nums1[i];\n            if(nums1[i]==0)\n                c1++;\n        }\n        for(int i =0;i<nums2.length;i++){\n            sum2+=nums2[i];\n            if(nums2[i]==0)\n                c2++;\n        }\n        if((c1==0 && c2==0 && sum1 != sum2) || (c1 == 0 && c2!=0 && sum2+c2>sum1) || (c2==0 && c1!=0 && sum1+c1>sum2)){\n            return -1;\n        }\n        \n        return Math.max(sum1+c1, sum2+c2);\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"minimum-equal-sum-of-two-arrays-after-replacing-zeros","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
